verbs.description: By E.J. DIONNE JR . WASHINGTON -- If [ARG0: President Trump 's survival tactics] [V: depend] [ARG1: upon dividing the country into warring camps] , does this mean his opponents have an interest in bringing the country together around shared purposes ? If the answer is " yes , " then those seeking to replace Trumpism with something better have to discover ways of engaging with voters whose choices in the last election differed from their own . Is there still a place in our politics for dialogue , persuasion and conversion ? There is a case that these are naive questions . The most important political fight this year is about flipping control of at least one house of Congress from the Republicans to the Democrats , and in lower - turnout mid - term elections , the emphasis is more on getting your core supporters to the polls than on altering anyone 's thinking . Standing firm , rallying the faithful and putting persuasion on hold seems a far more effective way to stop the GOP from holding its majorities and continuing to enable a corrupt and dangerous president . A " reach out to your adversaries " approach also seems soft and squishy in a confrontation involving a president who violates every rule , tells every lie and stoops as low as necessary ...

If the answer is " yes , " then those seeking to replace Trumpism with something better have to discover ways of engaging with voters whose choices in the last election differed from their own . Is there still a place in our politics for dialogue , persuasion and conversion ? There is a case that these are naive questions . The most important political fight this year is about flipping control of at least one house of Congress from the Republicans to the Democrats , and in lower - turnout mid - term elections , the emphasis is more on getting your core supporters to the polls than on altering anyone 's thinking . Standing firm , rallying the faithful and putting persuasion on hold seems a far more effective way to stop [ARG0: the GOP] from holding its majorities and continuing to [V: enable] [ARG1: a corrupt and dangerous president] . A " reach out to your adversaries " approach also seems soft and squishy in a confrontation involving a president who violates every rule , tells every lie and stoops as low as necessary ...
